data.title: France Could Get Its 2nd Female Prime Minister – Women's eNews
images: https://womensenews.org/wp-content/blogs.dir/46/files/upload/52169/Aubry Hollande by Martine Aubry on CC 2_0(2).jpg
data.meta_description: Newly elected French President Hollande could easily choose Martine Aubry, the champion of the 35-hour workweek, as the country's next prime minister.
